title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 49.3 - 1973 and older vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 49.3 - 1973 and older vehicles

State Regulations

Every 1973 and older motor vehicle required to have seat
safety belts by section
383
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law shall have seat safety belts which conform to the
requirements of this Part as it existed on September 30, 1974. This Part shall
not apply to those motor vehicles not registered pursuant to the provisions of
subdivision (6) of section
401
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
49.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
